President Trump has frozen funding to university labs and hospitals  across the board. For example, Northwestern University in Evanston, IL,  a cancer research powerhouse that earns hundreds of millions of dollars  of NIH grants annually has had its accounts frozen by the NIH for the  past 6 weeks.
